title: Survey Reveals High Dependence on AI for Dating Advice Among Young Australians
description: In a recent study conducted by specialized artificial intelligence dating advice app Meeno, surprising trends and perspectives on the usage of AI for dating and relationship advice have emerged among young Australians aged 18-34. With over 500 participants surveyed, the study sheds light on the prevalence of seeking advice from AI platforms like ChatGPT and […]

title: Can Sovereign AI Bridge Cultural Divides in the Global AI Landscape?
description: In a pivotal interview, Nvidia Corp. CEO Jensen Huang ignited discussions on the emergence of a second wave of artificial intelligence, driven not solely by private enterprise but by a concerted effort towards “sovereign AI.” This term, encapsulating the imperative for nations to cultivate their own AI capabilities, has gained traction among tech leaders and […]
